meanings.definition: Relating to activities or subjects that complement the academic curriculum.
meanings.sent1: The cocurricular science fair enhanced the students' learning experience.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the cocurricular art classes after school.
meanings.sent3: The cocurricular gardening club made learning about plants fun.
meanings.sent4: His cocurricular involvement in music was like adding color to a black-and-white picture.
meanings.sent5: The cocurricular field trips made the lessons come alive for the students.

meanings.definition: Involving participation in extracurricular activities alongside academic studies.
meanings.sent1: The cocurricular debate team practiced after school every day.
meanings.sent2: Students found joy in their cocurricular sports activities.
meanings.sent3: The cocurricular drama club made learning about acting exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her cocurricular involvement in volunteering was like a shining star in her academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The cocurricular coding club helped students develop new skills outside the classroom.
